ai-patthana12.11:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.11:0.3_0: Transmigration with the sake of the great seers,
ai-patthana12.11:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana12.11:4.1_0: that’s not easy to teach you.
ai-patthana12.11:5.1_0: mind is not associated with the mind,
ai-patthana12.11:5.1_1: nor is it unable to teach the mind.
ai-patthana12.11:5.1_2: Neither causes and reasons: five produces the objects of conditions,
ai-patthana12.11:6.1_0: They’re not able to teach the Dhamma for the texts,
ai-patthana12.11:7.1_0: They don’t neglect the teaching of the mind.
ai-patthana12.11:7.1_2: or produces the mind produced by mental precisely originated by the mind.
ai-patthana12.11:7.1_3: They’re not able to teach Dhamma to the beginning with the mind.
ai-patthana12.11:7.1_4: or rolling the mind rolled by the mind,
ai-patthana12.11:8.1_0: I won’t give teachings to them.
ai-patthana12.11:8.1_1: It’s not easy to teach Dhamma to someone else,
ai-patthana12.11:8.1_2: the five constructions on the basis of happiness ...
ai-patthana12.11:9.1_0: Not for the sake of grasping,
ai-patthana12.11:9.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.11:10.1_0: It’s not easy to make a guide for the teaching, or to ill will.
